Key Match Events: Derrick White and Jayson Tatum combined for 43 points
Payton Pritchard and Jrue Holiday totaled six 3-pointers
Post-Match Reflections: The Celtics — who played without Jaylen Brown (shoulder) — cruise to victory
Houston could not keep pace while falling to 1-3 on its five-game homestand
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jabari Smith Jr., who broke his left (non-shooting) hand during shootaround earlier Friday
Smith is scheduled to undergo surgery and is expected to be sidelined for four to eight weeks
Others: Boston extended to a 17-4 run and double-digit lead Houston shaved to 37-31 entering the second
